step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap, maintaining an upright posture.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a little closer to your head as you bring your hands up.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Focus on keeping your head upright and avoiding pulling forward.
Good hold! You maintained the position effectively. Remember to breathe deeply.
Smooth return to the starting position. Ensure your wrists stay aligned as you bring your hands back down.
Second rep starting strong. Keep those hands clasped and your posture tall.
You're raising your hands again. Focus on keeping the elbows closer to your head this time.
Excellent spread of the elbows! Continue to keep your head upright and avoid any forward strain.
Holding steady. You're doing great maintaining the stretch.
Great job completing the second rep! Ensure your wrists stay aligned as you return to the start.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close to your head when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Maintain an upright posture throughout, avoiding pulling forward, to maximize the benefits for your shoulders and chest.
